inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed multiple myeloma requiring systemic treatment (according to CRAB criteria as specified in the appendix I) with following characteristics: Subject is not a candidate for high-dose chemotherapy and stem cell transplantation due to age, presence of comorbidities likely to have a negative impact on tolerability of HDT-SCT, or subject preference
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease, defined as any quantifiable monoclonal protein value, defined by at least one of the following three measurements (Durie et al., 2006): Serum M-protein ≥ 10g/l or Urine light-chain (M-protein) of ≥ 200 mg/24 hours or Serum FLC assay: involved FLC level ≥ 10 mg/dl provided sFLC ratio is abnormal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: WHO performance status 0-3 (WHO=3 is allowed only when related to MM and not to co-morbid conditions) (see appendix III)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All patients must be willing and capable to use adequate contraception during the complete therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All patients must agree to abstain from donating blood while on study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand character and individual consequences of the clinical trial
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent (must be available before enrolment in the trial)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient has known hypersensitivity to bortezomib, bendamustine and prednisone or to any of the constituent compounds (incl. boron and mannitol).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Systemic AL amyloidosis (except for patients with AL amyloidosis of the skin or the bone marrow)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Chemotherapy or radiotherapy during the past 5 years except patients with local radiotherapy in case of local myeloma progression. (Note: patients may have received a cumulative dose of up to 160 mg of dexamethasone or equivalent as emergency therapy within 3 weeks prior to study entry.)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Plasma cell leukemia which requires the presence of 20% of plasma cell in peripheral blood leukocytes and at least 2 plasma cells/nl.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Severe cardiac dysfunction (NYHA classification III-IV, see appendix III)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Significant hepatic dysfunction (serum bilirubin ≥ 2 mg/dl or ASAT and/or ALAT ≥ 2.5 times normal level), unless related to myeloma
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple comorbidities, including systemic amyloidosis, which may impact tolerability of HDT-SCT.
